    • Method Detail

      • ofType

        public ExceptionAssertion ofType(Class<?> type)
        Verifies that an exception is of a specified type, e.g.  IllegalArgumentException

        Could be renamed to isOfType (override of superclass method)

        Parameters:
        type - type to test that exception object is instance of
        Returns:
        this if exception object is of expected type
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if exception object is not of expected type

      • withMessage

        public ExceptionAssertion withMessage(String expected,
                                      CompareType compareType)
        Verifies that an exception has the specified message
        Parameters:
        expected - the expected message
        compareType - how to do the comparison (substring, case-insensitive, etc.)
        Returns:
        this if exception message matches expected
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if exception message does not match expected
